document.full_text: two weeks after an independent commission determined that massey energy was to blame for the explosion that killed 29 miners last year, a 102-page report disputed the conclusion.
document.title: massey energy's ex-chief rejects finding in blast
lines_and_colors: two weeks after an independent commission determined that massey energy was to blame for the explosion that killed 29 miners last year, a 102-page report disputed the conclusion.
